Tests that pseudo elements and their styles are handled properly.

          ::before
          "Text"
          ::after
      </div>
    - <div id="empty">
          ::before
          ::after
      </div>
  </div>

element.style  { ()

display: block;


======== Pseudo ::before element ========
[expanded]

======== Pseudo ::after element ========
[expanded]

content: "AFTER";

[expanded]

content: "AFTER";
